message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This investment promises substantial returns and could be a game-changer for your company.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, my budget is quite limited. I am willing to pay up to $1500000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
